history.text: I already have a strong dislike for this movie
Why do you have a strong  dislike for it?

its just a rip off of a short film that came out a
 couple years ago
Based of the document it seems to be a visually stunning movie.
Do you normally like fantasy movies?
yes i do but im not just going to watch a movie because its pretty

What else makes you 
 watch a movie?
i generally watch movies for an interesting story premise
So you don't believe the story was interesting?
no ive seen it before in that short film i mentioned
I'm not familiar with that film
cant remember the name off hand but the story was the same essentially
I think the characters were still well potrayed
i mean there is only so much you can do with such a simple premise
it relies entirely on the nature of the creature to provide any kind of interest and conflict in the story
I actually found the creatures role to be minimal.
I think you have to explore the relationship between the other characters to find depth in the story.
you say that but how itll play out is kinda predictable
The relationship between the neighbors was very important. Also Octavia Butlers character seemed to be the voice of resaon.
well thats to be expected as she interprets elisa to the rest of the characters
No rue. Being an the the one to interpret and making a sound decision are not the samething
*true
what im saying is that of course that character is going to be the voice of reason as she can speak and elisa cant
wheras normally the main character would be the voice of reason
Sometimes you have to look at things from a different perspective.
it feels hard to do that when i feel like this has all been done before
There are no new ideas. You have to find the beauty in everything.
This conversation has been done before, but never between the two of us.
lol
there are almost certainly new ideas
and youre probably right about the conversation bit

There are new interpretations
 about the same ideas
Nobody will tell the same story in the same manor.
The other film you saw may have played up different relationships or different characters.
it did do that
however because of so much similarity

i cant get behind this because it jus
t feels like a longer version of what ive already seen

uid1response.feedback: other user had  good conversation about the movie
